title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Skills: Development and Application of TVET Blended Learning Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can create TVET blended learning design documents using the ADDIE model and rapid prototyping methods.
They can produce blended learning content for language education using digital tools (LMS/authoring tools, etc.).
They can design strategies to measure learner engagement and achievement through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
